titleInfo.title: Linda Shanks, CBC's First Female Graduate

mods.abstract: Linda Shanks was honored at the time of her graduation by fellow grads in front of the Christian Brothers College sign. While she knew she was one of the first woman admitted (she was among the first forty), she did not realize she would be the first to receive a degree.
